translations.text: The Most Compassionate
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Arrahman
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: taught the Quran,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: AAallama alqur-an
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: created humanity,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Khalaqa al-insan
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: ˹and˺ taught them speech.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: AAallamahu albayan
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: The sun and the moon ˹travel˺ with precision.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ashshamsu walqamaru bihusban
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: The stars and the trees bow down ˹in submission˺.<sup foot_note=77469>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wannajmu washshajaru yasjudan
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: As for the sky, He raised it ˹high˺, and set the balance ˹of justice˺
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wassamaa rafaAAahawawadaAAa almeezan
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: so that you do not defraud the scales.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Alla tatghaw fee almeezan
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَقِيمُوا۟ ٱلْوَزْنَ بِٱلْقِسْطِ وَلَا تُخْسِرُوا۟ ٱلْمِيزَانَ

translations.text: Weigh with justice, and do not give short measure.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waaqeemoo alwazna bilqisti walatukhsiroo almeezan
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: He laid out the earth for all beings.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wal-arda wadaAAahalil-anam
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: In it are fruit, palm trees with date stalks,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Feeha fakihatun wannakhluthatu al-akmam
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: and grain with husks, and aromatic plants.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walhabbu thoo alAAasfiwarrayhan
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you ˹humans and jinn˺ both deny?<sup foot_note=77470>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fabi-ayyi ala-i rabbikumatukaththiban
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: He created humankind from ˹sounding˺ clay like pottery,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Khalaqa al-insana min salsalinkalfakhkhar
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَخَلَقَ ٱلْجَآنَّ مِن مَّارِجٍ مِّن نَّارٍ

translations.text: and created jinn from a ˹smokeless˺ flame of fire.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wakhalaqa aljanna min marijinmin nar
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fabi-ayyi ala-i rabbikumatukaththiban
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: ˹He is˺ Lord of the two easts and the two wests.<sup foot_note=77471>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Rabbu almashriqayni warabbu almaghribayn
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fabi-ayyi ala-i rabbikumatukaththiban
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: He merges the two bodies of ˹fresh and salt˺ water,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Maraja albahrayni yaltaqiyan
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: yet between them is a barrier they never cross.<sup foot_note=77472>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Baynahuma barzakhun la yabghiyan
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fabi-ayyi ala-i rabbikumatukaththiban
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Out of both ˹waters˺ come forth pearls and coral.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yakhruju minhuma allu/luo walmarjan
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fabi-ayyi ala-i rabbikumatukaththibani
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَهُ ٱلْجَوَارِ ٱلْمُنشَـَٔاتُ فِى ٱلْبَحْرِ كَٱلْأَعْلَـٰمِ

translations.text: To Him belong the ships with raised sails, sailing through the seas like mountains.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walahu aljawari almunshaatufee albahri kal-aAAlam
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fabi-ayyi ala-i rabbikumatukaththiban
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Every being on earth is bound to perish.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Kullu man AAalayha fan
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَيَبْقَىٰ وَجْهُ رَبِّكَ ذُو ٱلْجَلَـٰلِ وَٱلْإِكْرَامِ

translations.text: Only your Lord Himself,<sup foot_note=77473>1</sup> full of Majesty and Honour, will remain ˹forever˺.<sup foot_note=77474>2</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wayabqa wajhu rabbika thooaljalali wal-ikram
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fabi-ayyi ala-i rabbikumatukaththiban
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَسْـَٔلُهُۥ مَن فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ كُلَّ يَوْمٍ هُوَ فِى شَأْنٍ

translations.text: All those in the heavens and the earth are dependent on Him. Day in and day out He has something to bring about.<sup foot_note=77475>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yas-aluhu man fee assamawatiwal-ardi kulla yawmin huwa fee sha/n
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fabi-ayyi ala-i rabbikumatukaththiban
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: We will soon attend to you ˹for judgment˺, O  two multitudes ˹of jinn and humans˺!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Sanafrughu lakum ayyuha aththaqalan
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fabi-ayyi ala-i rabbikumatukaththiban
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَـٰمَعْشَرَ ٱلْجِنِّ وَٱلْإِنسِ إِنِ ٱسْتَطَعْتُمْ أَن تَنفُذُوا۟ مِنْ أَقْطَارِ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ فَٱنفُذُوا۟ ۚ لَا تَنفُذُونَ إِلَّا بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ

translations.text: O  assembly of jinn and humans! If you can penetrate beyond the realms of the heavens and the earth, then do so. ˹But˺ you cannot do that without ˹Our˺ authority.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ya maAAshara aljinni wal-insiini istataAAtum an tanfuthoo min aqtari assamawatiwal-ardi fanfuthoo la tanfuthoonailla bisultan
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fabi-ayyi ala-i rabbikumatukaththiban
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يُرْسَلُ عَلَيْكُمَا شُوَاظٌ مِّن نَّارٍ وَنُحَاسٌ فَلَا تَنتَصِرَانِ

translation.text: you will (be able to) defend yourselves

translations.text: Flames of fire and ˹molten˺ copper will be sent against you, and you will not be able to defend one another.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yursalu AAalaykuma shuwathunmin narin wanuhasun fala tantasiran
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fabi-ayyi ala-i rabbikumatukaththiban
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَإِذَا ٱنشَقَّتِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ فَكَانَتْ وَرْدَةً كَٱلدِّهَانِ

translations.text: ˹How horrible will it be˺ when the heavens will split apart, becoming rose-red like ˹burnt˺ oil!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fa-itha inshaqqati assamaofakanat wardatan kaddihan
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fabi-ayyi ala-i rabbikumatukaththiban
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَيَوْمَئِذٍ لَّا يُسْـَٔلُ عَن ذَنۢبِهِۦٓ إِنسٌ وَلَا جَآنٌّ

translations.text: On that Day there will be no need for any human or jinn to be asked about their sins.<sup foot_note=77476>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fayawma-ithin la yus-alu AAan thanbihiinsun wala jan
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fabi-ayyi ala-i rabbikumatukaththiban
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يُعْرَفُ ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ بِسِيمَـٰهُمْ فَيُؤْخَذُ بِٱلنَّوَٰصِى وَٱلْأَقْدَامِ

translations.text: The wicked will be recognized by their appearance, then will be seized by ˹their˺ forelocks and feet.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: YuAArafu almujrimoona biseemahumfayu/khathu binnawasee wal-aqdam
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fabi-ayyi ala-i rabbikumatukaththiban
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: هَـٰذِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ ٱلَّتِى يُكَذِّبُ بِهَا ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ

translations.text: ˹They will be told,˺ “This is the Hell which the wicked denied.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Hathihi jahannamu allatee yukaththibubiha almujrimoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: They will alternate between its flames and scalding water.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yatoofoona baynaha wabayna hameeminan
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?<sup foot_note=77477>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fabi-ayyi ala-i rabbikumatukaththiban
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And whoever is in awe of standing before their Lord will have two Gardens.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waliman khafa maqama rabbihijannatan
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fabi-ayyi ala-i rabbikumatukaththiban
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: ˹Both will be˺ with lush branches.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thawata afnan
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fabi-ayyi ala-i rabbikumatukaththiban
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: In each ˹Garden˺ will be two flowing springs.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Feehima AAaynani tajriyan
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fabi-ayyi ala-i rabbikumatukaththiban
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: In each will be two types of every fruit.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Feehima min kulli fakihatinzawjan
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fabi-ayyi ala-i rabbikumatukaththiban
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ فُرُشٍۭ بَطَآئِنُهَا مِنْ إِسْتَبْرَقٍ ۚ وَجَنَى ٱلْجَنَّتَيْنِ دَانٍ

translations.text: Those ˹believers˺ will recline on furnishings lined with rich brocade. And the fruit of both Gardens will hang within reach.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Muttaki-eena AAala furushin bata-inuhamin istabraqin wajana aljannatayni dan
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fabi-ayyi ala-i rabbikumatukaththiban
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فِيهِنَّ قَـٰصِرَٰتُ ٱلطَّرْفِ لَمْ يَطْمِثْهُنَّ إِنسٌ قَبْلَهُمْ وَلَا جَآنٌّ

translations.text: In both ˹Gardens˺ will be maidens of modest gaze, who no human or jinn has ever touched before.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Feehinna qasiratu attarfilam yatmithhunna insun qablahum wala jan
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fabi-ayyi ala-i rabbikumatukaththiban
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Those ˹maidens˺ will be ˹as elegant˺ as rubies and coral.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Kaannahunna alyaqootu walmarjan
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fabi-ayyi ala-i rabbikumatukaththiban
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Is there any reward for goodness except goodness?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Hal jazao al-ihsani illaal-ihsan
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fabi-ayyi ala-i rabbikumatukaththiban
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And below these two ˹Gardens˺ will be two others.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wamin doonihima jannatan
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fabi-ayyi ala-i rabbikumatukaththiban
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Both will be dark green.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Mudhammatan
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fabi-ayyi ala-i rabbikumatukaththiban
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: In each will be two gushing springs.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Feehima AAaynani naddakhatan
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fabi-ayyi ala-i rabbikumatukaththiban
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: In both will be fruit, palm trees, and pomegranates.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Feehima fakihatun wanakhlunwarumman
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fabi-ayyi ala-i rabbikumatukaththiban
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: In all Gardens will be noble, pleasant mates.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Feehinna khayratun hisan
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fabi-ayyi ala-i rabbikumatukaththiban
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: ˹They will be˺ maidens with gorgeous eyes, reserved in pavilions.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Hoorun maqsooratun feealkhiyam
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fabi-ayyi ala-i rabbikumatukaththiban
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَمْ يَطْمِثْهُنَّ إِنسٌ قَبْلَهُمْ وَلَا جَآنٌّ

translations.text: No human or jinn has ever touched these ˹maidens˺ before.<sup foot_note=77478>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Lam yatmithhunna insun qablahum walajan
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fabi-ayyi ala-i rabbikumatukaththiban
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ رَفْرَفٍ خُضْرٍ وَعَبْقَرِىٍّ حِسَانٍ

translations.text: All ˹believers˺ will be reclining on green cushions and splendid carpets.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Muttaki-eena AAala rafrafin khudrinwaAAabqariyyin hisan
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fabi-ayyi ala-i rabbikumatukaththiban
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: تَبَـٰرَكَ ٱسْمُ رَبِّكَ ذِى ٱلْجَلَـٰلِ وَٱلْإِكْرَامِ

translations.text: Blessed is the Name of your Lord, full of Majesty and Honour.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Tabaraka ismu rabbika theealjalali wal-ikram
translations.resource_name: Transliteration
